ygData.subject: Writing source (seed) in arc file
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I need a way to track from which seed (source) a URI came from. This information is written down in the crawl.log if I set the attribute source-tag-seeds

Hi,

I need a way to track from which seed (source) a URI came from. This 
=
information is written down in the crawl.log if I set the 
attribute 'sourc=
e-tag-seeds' in the frontier. But it will be more 
intersting to if the see=
d is marked as an HTTP header and survives all 
the way down to the arc rec=
ord. After reading the code, I thought that 
the HTTP fetcher is a good pla=
ce to inject some HTTP headers into the 
HTTP response but I cannot see whe=
re in code I can do that.
Anybody can give me some advice in how I can add =
more headers to the 
HTTP response so that I can recover them in the arc fi=
le?

Thanks in advance
Barabasy
